title: AL.LI.MAN BRITISH AND SCOTTISH
notOurCat: This cat is not from our cattery

contactUsPage.about: Our kittens will become true friends for you for many years. We are ready to help with the choice and provide support after the kitten moves. Delivery is carried out anywhere in the world
contactUsPage.description: Welcome to the wonderful world of British and Scottish cats. My name is Bukanova Natalia, I am a certified felinologist and head of Al Li MaN cattery. The nursery has a homely, cozy atmosphere. Our cats live with us in the apartment and are full members of the family. Every day, both adult cats and kittens receive maximum care and attention. Therefore, the hallmark of our cattery is cats with an exceptionally kind, affectionate character. High breed qualities are confirmed by international experts at licensed exhibitions, where our animals receive invariably excellent marks. animals are distinguished by good health The cattery is registered in the World Cat Federation (WCF) If you live in another city or country, careful delivery of a kitten is possible

footerDescription: Our beautiful kittens and cats will be great companions to you and will love you forever. We are always happy to assist you in your choice.
